original_text: That which was from the beginning, which we have heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we looked upon and have touched with our hands, concerning the word of life—
korean_text: 태초부터 있는 생명의 말씀에 관하여는 우리가 들은 바요 눈으로 본 바요 자세히 보고 우리의 손으로 만진 바라

sentences.original_text: That which was from the beginning,
which we have seen with our eyes,
which we looked upon and have touched with our hands,
